Publication.title: Waiting Strategies for Regular and Emergency Patient Transportation

Reference.referenceText: 1. Attanasio, A., Cordeau, J.-F., Ghiani, G., and Laporte, G. (2004) Parallel Tabu search heuristics for the dynamic multi-vehicle dial-a-ride problem. Parallel Computing 30:377–387.
2. Cordeau, J.-F., and Laporte, G. (2003) “The Dial-a-Ride Problem (DARP): Variants modelling issues and algorithms”. 4OR 1 , pp. 89–101.

3. Gendreau, M., Guertin, F., Potvin, J.-Y., and Séguin, R. (2002): “Neigh- borhood Search heuristic for a Dynamic Vehicle Dispatching Problem with Pickups and Deliveries”. Technical Report, Centre de recherche sur les transports, Université de Montréal. Forthcoming in Transportation Research C .
4. Gendreau, M., Laporte, G., and Semet, F. (2001): “A dynamic model and parallel tabu search heuristic for real-time ambulance relocation”. Parallel Computing 27, 1641–1653.

5. Jaw J.-J., Odoni, A., Psaraftis, H., Wilson, N. (1986): “A heuristic al- gorithm for the multi-vehicle advance request dial-a-ride problem with time windows”. Transportation Research B 20 (3), pp. 243-257.
6. Mitrović-Minić, S., and Laporte, G. (2004): “Waiting Strategies for the Dynamic Pickup and Delivery Problem with Time Windows”. Transportation Research B 38 , pp. 635-655.
